p: After analyzing many studies with nutmeg essential oil we found a few compounds which were not mentioned in publications. Our study showed that essential oil HD1 from nutmeg (Grenada) contains Î²-copaene (0.25%), bergamotene (0.07%), citronellyl decanoate (0.3%), cubebol (0.05%), cubenene (0.07%), and orthodene (0.51%) ( Figure 3).
